content:
";; connect the matrix
(define matrix-module
  (make-circuit 
    #:external-pins (row[4] col[5])
    ;; col in, row out
    #:connect 
    (for*/list ([i (in-range 4)]
                [j (in-range 5)])
               (debug "connecting" i j)
               (*- self.col[j]
                   (list-ref (list-ref matrix i) j)
                   self.row[i]))
    #:layout (inset (apply vc-append
                      (for/list ([row matrix])
                        (apply hc-append row)
                        ))
                    20)))"
